availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William Frankum and Magdaline Frankum. Married to Malinda Young Frankum on August 6, 1856. Farmer in Adair County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 2, p. 78. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, Harmony, p. 4. “Obituary,” The Adair County News (Columbia, Ky.), May 8, 1901, p. 4. Find A Grave, “Josiah Frankum (November 17, 1830-August 4, 1882),” Memorial #89184938, http://findagrave.com/memorial/89184938 (accessed February 14, 2018).
